value.title: Core Cloud Services - Manage services with the Azure portal
value.excerpt: Get acquainted with the Azure cloud platform through the Azure portal, where you create and manage all of your Azure resources.

value.title: Protect your virtual machines by using Azure Backup
value.excerpt: Use Azure Backup to help protect the data for on-premises servers, virtual machines, virtualized workloads, SQL Server, Azure Files, and more.

value.title: How to create and manage an App Service Domain | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: In this video, learn about the advantages of using an App Service Domain and how to create an App Service Domain using the Azure portal.   Try out these features in the Azure portal: https://portal.azure.com  Keep connected on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AzurePortal  And make sure to keep an eye on

value.title: Azure Portal “How To” Series
value.excerpt: Welcome to our weekly series that highlights specific aspects of the Azure portal so you can be more efficient and productive while deploying your cloud workloads from the portal.

topItems.title: Improvements to the Linux Virtual Machine experience | Azure Portal Series
topItems.excerpt: In this episode of the #Azure Portal "How To" Series, learn more about the improvements to the Linux Virtual Machine (VM) experience such as automatic SSH key generation, a new and improved landing page, and a new seamless connect experience.   Try out these features in the Azure portal: https://portal.azure.com

topItems.title: How to use blob versioning | Azure Portal Series
topItems.excerpt: In this video of the #Azure Portal "How To" series, learn how to automatically maintain previous versions of your blob and restore an earlier version of your blob if it is erroneously modified or deleted. topItems.excerpt: In this video of the Azure Portal "How To" series, learn about a new offering in the App Service family, Static Web Apps.
